name: Draw It! 2
description: The second part of the game Draw It! With the help of drawing and physics - help the smiley to get to the platform.Draw a smiley path using geometric shapes to get to the platform!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+,Windows 7, Windows 8,Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Inter HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 70 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+,Windows 7, Windows 8,Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Inter HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 70 MB available space
